conclusion: Analyze the given information and apply thermodynamics principles.
Line segment AB is parallel to the V-axis, indicating constant temperature.
The process from A to B is isothermal because temperature remains constant.
Work done by gas in isothermal process: W = nRT ln(Vf/Vi).
Given: W = 10 J, Vi = V0, Vf = 2V0, T = T0.
Substitute values into work formula: 10 = nRT0 ln(2).
For ideal gas, internal energy depends only on temperature.
Change in internal energy ΔU is zero because temperature is constant.
First law of thermodynamics: ΔU = Q - W.
Final answer: Heat absorbed by gas is 10 J.
